User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Priority pages for crawling
Allow: /qsi-map
Allow: /queer-intelligence
Allow: /ai-agents
Allow: /jane-goodall-memorial
Allow: /enterprise
Allow: /contact

# Block admin or sensitive areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /api/keys/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://vector-for-good.vercel.app/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional - helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Specific instructions for major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

# Social media crawlers
User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Allow: /

User-agent: Twitterbot
Allow: /

User-agent: LinkedInBot
Allow: /
